It has been some time since we have settled on this island in the hurricane's eye.
2 1 It pains me to report that our survery expeditions have not yet yielded any signs of any of our missing friends..
3 2 We shall depart for a final expedition of the bramble's exterior soon, where we shall search for survivors on shattered planet's north pole. But.. I do not have much hope.
4 3 However small the odds, I had clung to the hope that our missing friends had managed to escape somehow and survived on one of these planets, even without a distress beacon..
5 4 It seems.. I was simply mistaken in that hope.
6 5 The universe is truly cruel to have torn our clan apart, then left us to guess indefinitely at the fates of those we have lost...
7 6 Where would our clan would be today, if we had never heard the signal from the Eye.. or taken more precautions before heeding its call?
8 7 Our clan might have not lost so many, and its survivors might not have suffered such a long separation.
9 8 But.. If we had taken the proper precautions..
10 9 ..Who knows how many more clans and lives might have fallen prey to the same fate as they tried to follow us, and any who followed them?
11 10 My mind grows weary, ruminating on these endless possibilities...
12 11 Papa? Why are you sitting here alone?
13 12 I'm sleepy, papa.. Can we go back inside the tower and read a nocturnal story?
14 13 Of course, Phlox. I'll join you in the tower soon, my child.
15 14 Keek, wherever you are...
16 15 I promise to always care for your son like my very own.
